alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:27AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Covington and northeastern Okaloosa Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 927 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Dozier to near Florala to 9 miles northwest of Eglin Air Force Base to Wright. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crestview, Andalusia, Opp, Florala, Laurel Hill, Lockhart, Heath and Gantt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
